duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional in-office patient experience through intake, scheduling, billing, and insurance management.
Perform front office duties including check-in/check-out, insurance verification, and paperwork tasks.
Contribute to team development, problem solving, and support in-office providers with ad hoc tasks.
Master technology suite including Slack, G-suite, Zoom, and Electronic Medical Record System 1Life to complete daily work.
Perform daily office upkeep, maintain the look and feel of patient and employee facing spaces, and restock supplies.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of experience in high touch customer or patient facing roles
